data.actual_result: In the typing box, the content of the message will appear with the unicode system emoji (e.g \🤔)
data.expected_result: In the typing box, the content of the message will appear with the emoji alias between `::` (e.g **\:thinking\:**)
data.short_description: Editing a message containing default emojis will always display the unicode system emoji instead of the alias in the typing box
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message containing a default emoji using the Discord emoji picker (e.g 🤔) - Long press on message and press Edit
